Verses: 1 pinnum Naan Sollugiradhennavenil, Sudhandharavaaliyaanavan Ellaavatrirkum Ejamaanaayirundhum, Avan Sirupillaiyaayirukkungaalamalavum, Avanukkum Adimaiyaanavanukkum Viththiyaasamillai.
3 appadiye Naamum Sirupillaigalaayirundha Kaalaththil Ivvulagaththin Vazhipaadugalukku Adimaippattavargalaayirundhom.
4 naam Puththirasuvigaaraththaiyadaiyumpdi Niyaayappiramaanaththirkuk Keezhppattavargalai Meettukkollaththakkadhaaga,
5 kaalam Niraiverinapodhu, Sthireeyinidaththir Pirandhavarum Niyaayappiramaanaththirkuk Keezhaanavarumaagiya Thammudaiya Kumaaranai Dhevan Anuppinaar.
6 melum Neengal Puththiraraayirukkirapadiyinaal, Appaa, Pidhaave! Endru Kooppidaththakkadhaaga Dhevan Thamadhu Kumaaranudaiya Aaviyai Ungal Irudhayangalil Anuppinaar.
7 aagaiyaal Ini Nee Adimaiyaayiraamal Puththiranaayirukkiraai; Nee Puththiraneyaanaal, Kiristhumoolamaai Dhevanudaiya Sudhandharanaayumirukkiraai.
8 neengal Dhevanai Ariyaamalirundhapodhu, Subaavaththinpadi Dhevargalallaadhavargalukku Adimaigalaayirundheergal.

9 ippozhudho Neengal Dhevanai Arindhirukka, Alladhu Dhevanaale Ariyappattirukka, Belanatradhum Verumaiyaanadhumaana Avvazhipaadugalukku Neengal Marupadiyum Thirumbi, Marupadiyum Avaigalukku Adimaippadumpadi Virumbugiradheppadi?
10 naatkalaiyum, Maadhangalaiyum, Kaalangalaiyum, Varushangalaiyum Paarkkireergale.
11 naan Ungalukkaagap Pirayaasappattadhu Veenaaippoyitro Endru Ungalaikkuriththup Bayandhirukkiren.
12 sagodharare, Ennaippolaagungal Endru Ungalai Vendikkollugiren; Naan Ungalaippolumaanene. Enakku Neengal Aniyaayam Ondrumseyyavillai.
13 ungalukkuth Therindhirukkirapadi, Naan Sareera Balaveenaththodu Mudhalaandharam Ungalukku Suviseshaththaip Pirasangiththen.
14 appadiyirundhum En Sareeraththil Undaayirukkira Sodhanaiyai Neengal Asattaipannaamalum, Arosiyaamalum, Dhevathoodhanaippolavum, Kiristhu Yesuvaippolavum, Ennai Etrukkondeergal.
15 appozhudhu Neengal Kondirundha Aanandha Baakkiyam Enge? Ungal Kangalaip Pidungi Enakkuk Kodukkakkoodumaanaal, Appadiyum Seydhiruppeergalendru Ungalukku Saatchiyaayirukkiren.
16 naan Ungalukku Saththiyaththai Sonnadhinaale Ungalukku Saththuruvaaneno?
17 avargal Ungalai Naadi Vairaakkiyam Paaraattugiraargal, Aagilum Nalmanadhode Appadich Cheyyaamal, Neengal Avargalai Naadi Vairaakkiyam Paaraattumporuttu Ungalaip Purampaakka Virumbugiraargal.
18 nalvishayaththil Vairaakkiyam Paraattuvadhu Nalladhudhaan; Adhai Naan Ungalidaththil Irukkumpozhudhumaaththiramalla, Eppozhudhum Paaraattavendum.
19 en Sirupillaigale, Kiristhu Ungalidaththil Uruvaagumalavum Ungalukkaaga Marupadiyum Karppavedhanaippadugiren.
20 ungalaikkuriththu Naan Sandhegappadugirapadiyaal, Naan Ippozhudhu Ungalidaththil Vandhirundhu, Veruvagaiyaagap Pesa Virumbugiren.
21 niyaayappiramaanaththirkuk Keezhppattirukka Virumbugira Neengal Niyaayappiramaanam Sollugiradhaik Ketkavillaiyaa? Idhai Enakku Sollungal.
22 aabiragaamukku Irandu Kumaarar Irundhaargal Endru Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu; Oruvan Adimaiyaanavalidaththil Pirandhavan, Oruvan Suyaadheenamullavalidaththil Pirandhavan.
23 adimaiyaanavalidaththil Pirandhavan Maamsaththinpadi Pirandhaan, Suyaadheenamullavalidaththil Pirandhavan Vaakkuththaththaththinpadi Pirandhaan.
24 ivaigal Gnaana Arththamullavaigal; Andha Sthireegal Irandu Erpaadukalaam; Ondru Seenaaimalaiyilundaana Erpaadu, Adhu Adimaiththanaththirkullaagap Pillaiperugiradhu, Adhu Aagaar Enbavaldhaane.
25 aagaar Enbadhu Arabidhesaththilulla Seenaaimalai; Andha Aagaar Ippozhudhirukkira Erusalemukkuch Sari; Ival Than Pillaigalodekooda Adimaippattirukkiraale.
26 melaana Erusalemo Suyaadheenamullaval, Avale Nammellaarukkum Thaayaanaval.

27 andhappadi Pillaiperaadha Maladiye, Magizhndhiru; Karppavedhanaippataadhavale, Kalippaai Ezhumbi Aarppari; Purushanullavalaip Paarkkilum Anaadha Sthireekke Adhiga Pillaikalundu Endru Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
28 sagodharare Naam Eesaakkaippola Vaakkuththaththaththup Pillaigalaayirukkirom.
29 aagilum Maamsaththinpadi Pirandhavan Aaviyinpadi Pirandhavanai Appozhudhu Thunbappaduththinadhu Pola, Ippozhudhum Nadandhuvarugiradhu.

30 adhaikkuriththu Vedham Ennasollugiradhu: Adimaiyaanavalin Magan Suyaadheenamullavaludaiya Kumaaranode Sudhandharavaaliyaayiruppadhillai; Aagaiyaal Adimaiyaanavalaiyum, Avaludaiya Maganaiyum Purambe Thallu Endru Sollugiradhu.
31 ippadiyirukka, Sagodharare, Naam Adimaiyaanavalukkup Pillaigalaayiraamal, Suyaadheenamullavalukke Pillaigalaayirukkirom.
